summary: I want to make my first post that wasn't an introduction as a brainstorm session for what I want this site to be and become.  I have a few ideas of what I want to put on here but, I need to do some fleshing out of those ideas a little bit more.  Overall, I want this site to be a repository for my experiences when it comes to home lab building, coding, and book reviews...
title: Ideas and the Future of This Site

summary: Mastodon 4. 3 released today with a bunch of features but the one most people, including me, are excited about is author tags - this isn't the name of them but they also don't seem to have a proper name as far as I can tell.  Anyway, you need to do two things to get the "More from X" section you can see in the screenshot above...
title: Setting Up Mastodon Author Tags

summary: I'm not really sure what to write here.  Normally with a new beginning, there would be introductions but, I think it would be more fun to discover who I am as the posts are laid out.  I think a simple explanation of who I am is: a nerdy guy who loves to play games, read, and build home labs (still very new to this aspect)...
title: A New Beginning

summary: A hastily rushed sunset for today's submission.  Just as well the real thing doesn't look as bad as this .
